name: RGLK_
description:
A super simple roguelike that was meant for Ludum Dare 43 but time was short and the theme was never fully realized but I hope you enjoy :)

RGLK_ is a roguelike where you repetitively visit a magic shop where each item comes with it's own blessing and curse. 

Arrow Keys/WASD - Move
Enter/Space/X - Use menus

A helper mode is included in the options to help understand the enemies attack patterns.
